input: Topic: We should end mandatory retirement<sep>Argument: If people want to work passed a certain age it is their choice<sep>Keypoint: A mandatory retirement age decreases institutional knowledge

Topic: We should abolish capital punishment<sep>Argument: Capital punishment has done nothing to actually deter serious crime in this country<sep>Keypoint: The death penalty is ineffective in deterring crimes

Topic: We should subsidize space exploration<sep>Argument: The universe outside of our planet holds the most fascinating mysteries, of course we should explore it and learn, it is ignorant and arrogant to think this planet is all that matters<sep>Keypoint: Space exploration can help in colonizing the resources/lands of other planets
